name: Boxer Life
description:
[This game is in Portuguese only].

This is a boxing-based Visual Novel game.

Game made by Nikolas Pereira and Samuel Vaz:

Nikolas Pereira - Programming and Sound editing.

Samuel Vaz - Idea and Game story.

This game is free, we received nothing with this game!

All music and image rights in the game are the property of their respective owners.
